snippet: The New York Times overtook USA Today for second place, after The Wall Street Journal, with total circulation up 17.6 percent.
abstract: Nation's newspapers report that they suffered slight declines in total circulation, but are benefiting from an increase in digital subscriptions; Wall Street Journal has the highest circulation, at 2,378,827; New York Times reports circulation of 1,865,318, a 17.6 percent rise over a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times overtook USA Today for second place, after The Wall Street Journal, with total circulation up 17.6 percent.

headline.seo: Digital Subscriptions Bolster Newspapers’ Slipping Circulation Figures
headline.main: Newspapers Post Gains in Digital Circulation
headline.print_headline: Newspapers Post Gains In Digital Circulation
